name: Achievement Hunter: Chef
description:
Achievement Hunter: Chef

In this 2d action / shooter you will play for the chef who wants to stop the pig who are trying to destroy his kitchen.
You do not have any allies. There are only you and a huge number of pigs.
Fight for your kitсhen, increase your skill and prevent invasion of pigs into your kitchen.

Game features:
  • 5000 ACHIEVEMENTS
  • Minimum allowable price
  • Cartoon style
  • Fearless protagonist
